metadata.title: ACI Toddler Girls' Frozen Light-up Blue Sneakers (10 Little Kid)
description: Her little feet will be glowing in these toddler girls' Frozen light-up sneakers. Sporting Elsa and Anna, these light-up iridescent sparkle finish sneakers will be her new wardrobe favorite. Swirling winter snowflakes adorn the shoe in true Frozen fashion. A hook-and-loop strap closure and pull-tab make dressing simple. The cushioned footbed, and padded collar and tongue provide comfort for her tiny feet.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "10.2 x 6.8 x 3.4 inches; 1.1 Pounds", "Department": "baby-girls", "Batteries": "1 CR2 batteries required.", "Date First Available": "March 6, 2018"}
